pullrequest.title: Added basis for runviewer marker functionality

content.raw: That's a extremely valid point, and something we should consider. At the very least, we should ensure that runviewer is backwards compatible with loading the markers from the location you currently use if there is a compelling reason to put it somewhere else.
content.html: That's a extremely valid point, and something we should consider. At the very least, we should ensure that runviewer is backwards compatible with loading the markers from the location you currently use if there is a compelling reason to put it somewhere else.
